overview: Zeynep, a senior university student; Since he has otoscopy, he receives medication and psychological treatment. Zeynep, who blames herself for the death of her fiancé, sometimes feels that she is watching him from the outside (otoscopy) and experiences various delusions. Zeynep's situation; His lover Barış and his best friend İlke are also affected and their lives go on in turmoil. One day, Zeynep, who is experiencing advanced delusions, refuses the advice of her psychologist and escapes the treatment and decides to get used to life with the other person who follows her.
title: 11 'Diary of Schizophrenia'
